ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... think ... Read the original post that John Kim posted. It is a joke that has turned into a rumor. The guy who first posted the screenshot said: ...was
ygData.messageBody:
>I think proc is the incorrect term. Although this is all pure rumor I
think
>what is meant is that the weapon allows the user to click it and gate...not
>that the weapon would randomly fire gate when being used.
>
>>How does a weapon that procs gate make any sense at all?

Read the original post that John Kim posted. It is a joke that has turned
into a rumor.

The guy who first posted the screenshot said:

"...was browsing around the Druid's Grove and I found this link to a SS of
an NPC in the upcoming Plane of Hate.

I betcha he drops the holy-grail of bard weapons, the quill that procs
gate!!

Kellen, Songweaver of the 50th Hymn
Xegony"

Obviously, his comment "the quill the procs gate" is a joke. =)

Daleia
